polito.sdp2017.Components

Interface DBManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLiteManager

    public interface DBManager
    This interface is a description of a database manager regardless of the used DBMS.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • openConnection

        void openConnection(java.lang.String dbPath)
             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    java.sql.SQLException
        This method open the session with the database. Starting from now all other methods of this interface can run.
        Parameters:
        dbPath - : It's the path referred to the position of the database in the file system
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection()
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        It concludes the database session.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getDBPath

        java.lang.String getDBPath()
        Getter of the database path in the file system.
        Returns:
        A string referring to the path.

        Setter of the name for the database.
        Parameters:
        DBName - : The name to assign to the database.

        Getter of the name for the database.
        Returns:
        A string referring to the name of that database.

      • resetDatabase

        void resetDatabase()
        This method cleans the database content.

      • searchIP

        java.util.LinkedList<IP> searchIP(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> listOfParameters)
        An IP selection query is executed in order to obtain all those IPs that satisfy a set of properties listed in listOfParameters.
        Returns:
        A linkedList of object IPs, filled by the ResultSet of the query.

      • addIP

        void addIP(IP ipToBeAdded)
    throws java.sql.SQLException
        An IP insertion is performed on the database.
        Parameters:
        ipToBeAdded - is the filled IP, ready to be inserted
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • removeIP

        boolean removeIP(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String id,
                 boolean isCore)
        An IP remotion is performed on the database.
        Parameters:
        name: - it's the name of the IP to be removed.
        id: - it's the id of the IP to be removed.
        isCore: - it's referred to the fact whether the IP is a Core or a Manager
        Returns:
        true if everything ends well, otherwise false

      • searchConfiguration

        java.util.LinkedList<FPGAConfiguration> searchConfiguration(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfParameters)
        A FPGAConfiguration selection query is executed in order to obtain all those configurations that satisfy a set of properties listed in listOfParameters.
        Parameters:
        listOfParameters: - list of parameters selected by the final user.
        Returns:
        A linkedList of object FPGAConfigurations, filled by the ResultSet of the query.

      • removeConfiguration

        boolean removeConfiguration(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String id)
        An FPGAConfiguration remotion is performed on the database.
        Parameters:
        name: - it's the name of the configuration to be removed.
        id: - it's the id of the configuration to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if everything ends well, otherwise false
